name: 7wonders-tracker-backend
description: Backend API for 7 Wonders game tracker

scripts.build:frontend: if [ -d "../frontend" ]; then cd ../frontend && npm install && npm run build; else echo "Frontend directory not found, skipping frontend build"; fi
scripts.postbuild: npm run build:frontend && if [ -d "../frontend/dist" ]; then mkdir -p dist/frontend && cp -r ../frontend/dist/* dist/frontend/; else echo "Frontend dist not found, skipping copy"; fi
